alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:10PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Weld, western Arapahoe, Denver, western Adams and east central Boulder Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 309 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout tornado along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Mead to Todd Creek to near Greenwood Village, or along a line extending from 21 miles southwest of Greeley to 60 miles west of Fort Morgan to 6 miles south of Denver. Spotters reported brief funnel clouds near Dacono in southwest Weld County. A stronger storm near Erie was producing penny sized hail. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible, winds in excess of 40 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Landspout tornadoes can damage mobile homes, roofs, vehicles, and trees. Outdoor objects may be tossed about. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Denver, Aurora, eastern Thornton, Centennial, southeastern Longmont, northeastern Broomfield, Commerce City, Brighton, Erie, Greenwood Village, Firestone, Denver International Airport, D.I.A Terminal and Concourses, Frederick, Fort Lupton, Milliken, Lochbuie, Dacono, Mead and Platteville. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If a tornado is spotted seek shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
